name: Chevy Chase Characters In Movies Quiz / Test | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
'Caddyshack'.

	Released in 1980, also starring Rodney Dangerfield, Bill Murray, and Ted Knight.

'Seems Like Old Times'.

	Released in 1980, it was Chase's second movie with actress Goldie Hawn. A very funny movie.

'Spies Like Us'.

	Also starring Dan Aykroyd. Vanessa Angel played one of the Russian spies.

'Three Amigos!'.

	Also starring Steve Martin and Martin Short.

'Cops and Robbersons'.

	Also starring Jack Palance and Dianne Wiest. Released in 1994.

'Fletch'.

	Released in 1985, also had a sequel, 'Fletch Lives' (1989).

'Vacation'.

	aka 'National Lampoon's Vacation' (1983). Other movies with Chevy Chase playing Clark Griswold are: 'European Vacation' (1985), 'Christmas Vacation' (1989), and 'Vegas Vacation' (1997).
